hero.title: Automate RSL
hero.description: Maximize your progress in Raid Shadow Legends with intelligent automation. Farm resources, level heroes, autosell artifacts and accessories and dominate battlefields while you focus on strategy.
hero.cardDescription: dedicated to greatly improve and optimize your farming of the game.

license.activateStep1Details: After launching RSLBot, click on the Authenticate menu in the top navigation bar, then select Activate from the dropdown menu.
license.activateStep2Details: When the authentication dialog appears, enter your license key. You can copy your license key from the table above.
license.activateStep2Additional: Choose to activate for the current profile or all profiles.
license.activateStep3Details: After successful activation, you'll see a confirmation dialog stating that "Premium features unlocked!" The authentication status will also change from "Disconnected" to "Premium User" in the status panel.
license.troubleInvalidKey: Invalid License Key: Double-check that you've entered the correct license key with no extra spaces
license.troubleAlreadyActivated: Already Activated: Each license key can only be used on one machine at a time
license.troubleExpired: Expired License: Check your license status on this page to ensure it hasn't expired

errors.invalidSession: Invalid session, please log in again
errors.noCheckoutUrl: No checkout URL returned from the API

security.title: No Injection = Low Risk
security.description: The team worked hard on a non injection method of instructing a character to complete every possible task WITHOUT using injection or memory writing!
security.injectionDescription: The majority of public bots on the market today use one form or another of injection or memory writing. Injection simply stated is a software program changing values in the games memory to achieve an action (for example; if you want to click on an item, you would 'tell' the game that you clicked on the item by calling functions in Path of Exile).
security.nonInjectionDescription: The team worked hard on a non injection method of instructing a character to complete every possible task WITHOUT using injection or memory writing! While the everyday bot programmer would think of this to be a huge waste of time & resources (it is MUCH more work). However we think that it definitively worth it!
security.responsibilityDescription: We recognize that Grinding Gear Games is opposed to the use of bot programs and does not authorize them in the TOS/EULA. It is our position, however, that Grinding Gear Games has no right to control add-on software programs that third-party software developers create or sell and that we have every right to offer our program for sale. With that being said, we have no control over Grinding Gear Games's desire to rid its gaming environment of bot programs. By using our software, it is possible that Grinding Gear Games could ban your account and cite the language of its TOS and EULA as the reason for the ban. You should be aware that by using our software, Grinding Gear Games could take action against you for what it considers to be a breach of its contracts and that the risk of this happening is entirely on you the purchaser. If you are concerned about the possibility of being banned or being accused of violating Grinding Gear Games's contracts, you should not use our software.

refundPolicy.title: Our Refund Policy
refundPolicy.description: If you encounter any problems with your payment or if you're not satisfied with the product, we offer a refund policy. Please note that refunds will be processed minus the transaction processor fees (PayPal/Stripe fees) as these are non-refundable. Simply message alk on our Discord server or forum, and we'll process your refund promptly.

paymentSuccess.title: Payment Successful
paymentSuccess.successMessage: Your payment was successful! Your license will be activated shortly.
paymentSuccess.errorMessage: Payment verification failed. No session ID was provided.
paymentSuccess.processingNote: Please note: PayPal payments may take up to 3-5 minutes to process completely. Your license will be added to your account once payment processing is complete.
paymentSuccess.refreshNote: You will need to refresh the licenses page to see your newly added license after processing is complete.
